app_descript:
Trello - Organize Anything

Brief: Trello is an intuitive project management application that simplifies the organization of your projects, tasks, and daily workloads. With its versatile board, list, and card system, Trello allows for a customizable management experience, catering to personal and professional needs alike. Easily oversee your daily tasks, upcoming projects, calendar events and collaborate with your team on-the-go.
